original_text: Only rebel not ye against the Lord, neither fear ye the people of the land; for they are bread for us: their defence is departed from them, and the Lord is with us: fear them not.
korean_text: 다만 여호와를 거역하지는 말라 또 그 땅 백성을 두려워하지 말라 그들은 우리의 먹이라 그들의 보호자는 그들에게서 떠났고 여호와는 우리와 함께 하시느니라 그들을 두려워하지 말라 하나

sentences.original_text: Only rebel not ye against the Lord
neither fear ye the people of the land
for they are bread for us
their defence is departed from them
and the Lord is with us
